name: Mukhya Mantri Krishi Sa Sajuli Yojana (MMKSSY)
description: Aims to boost farm productivity by providing ₹5000 to 5 lakh farmers for farm tools via direct transfer.

name: PM-KISAN (Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi Yojana)
description: Provides income support of ₹6,000 per year to all eligible farmer families.

name: Soil Health Card Scheme
description: Provides farmers with a Soil Health Card which carries crop-wise recommendations of nutrients and fertilizers.

name: Rastriya Krishi Vikash Yojana (RKVY)
description: A broad scheme for agricultural development and allied sectors.

name: Bringing Green Revolution to Eastern India (BGREI)
description: Aims to increase agricultural productivity in Eastern India, focusing on rice and wheat.

name: Paramparagat Krishi Vikas Yojna (PKVY)
description: Promotes organic farming through cluster approach.

name: eNAM (Electronic National Agriculture Market)
description: An online trading platform for agricultural commodities, aiming to integrate mandis across the country.

name: Assam Farmer's Credit Subsidy Scheme (AFCSS)
description: Provides 25% reimbursement (subsidy) on short term crop loans up to a maximum cap of Rs. 25000.

name: Assam Govt Launches 50% Subsidy Scheme on Farm Equipment
description: Aims to provide advanced agricultural machinery for the cultivation of crops like paddy and pulses at a 50% subsidy.
